snippet: Kevin Durant's rare streak of games with least 25 points continued, and San Antonio's run of 19 straight wins came to a halt....

headline.print_headline: Durant, Thunder End Spurs' 19-Game Win Streak
headline.main: Durant, Thunder End Spurs' 19-Game Win Streak

lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant's rare streak of games with least 25 points continued, and San Antonio's run of 19 straight wins came to a halt.
